actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow businesses a deduction for meals provided employees on premise, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fairness to Employees for Meals in the Workplace Act of 1998

summary.text: Fairness to Employees for Meals in the Workplace Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to remove the limitation on the deduction by a business of the cost of food and beverages furnished to employees on premise.

titles.title: Fairness to Employees for Meals in the Workplace Act of 1998
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow businesses a deduction for meals provided employees on premise, and for other purposes.
